article.title: iGov Awarded $500 Million for Special Forces Tactical Network
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: iGov Technologies Inc., Reston, Va., has been awarded a $500 million single award indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to provide the Tactical Local Area Network Family of Systems acquisition, design, integration, production, and delivery in support of U.S. Special Operations Command, MacDill Air Force Base, Fla., which is the contracting activity.Â
